definitions.definition: A paved part of road, usually in a village or a town.
definitions.example: Walk down the street until you see a hotel on the right.

definitions.definition: A road as above but including the sidewalks (pavements) and buildings.
definitions.example: I live on the street down from Joyce Avenue.

definitions.definition: The people who live in such a road, as a neighborhood.
The people who spend a great deal of time on the street in urban areas, especially, the young, the poor, the unemployed, and those engaged in illegal activities.
An illicit or contraband source, especially of drugs.
definitions.example: I got some pot cheap on the street.
He's streets ahead of his sister in all the subjects in school.

definitions.definition: Each of the three opportunities that players have to bet, after the flop, turn and river.

definitions.example: a street cat; a street urchin

definitions.definition: (urban toponymy) By restriction, the streets that run perpendicular to avenues.
To build or equip with streets.
To eject; to throw onto the streets.
